name: vindicatory
content:

proving or showing that something is true or that someone is free from blame: This was a vindicatory rationale developed from theological first principles. The editorial made a number of pertinent points that were vindicatory for the organization. Related words
vindicate
vindication
law
  specialized intended as a punishment: Mitigation of punishment should not lessen the obligation of vindicatory justice. The Supreme Court has rejected the imposition of purely vindicatory damages. Synonym
punitive
